Dana Petroleum plc bụ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na mmepụta mmanụ na gas nke dị na obodo Aberdeen, di na Scotland
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na North Sea, Afrika ya na Middle East
Ọ bụ onye enyemaka nke Korea National Oil Corporation ma bụrụkwa onye bụbu onye otu FTSE 250 Index.
Tom Cross guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na afo1994 iji mebie ohere mmanụ North Sea

N'afọ 2007, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara Ener Petroleum maka nde £24 yana ọrụ mmanụ na gas nke Devon Energy Corporation na Egypt maka US nde $375. Na June 2010, Dana Petroleum kwetara inweta Petro Canada Netherlands site na Suncor Energy maka ihe dịja nde $393, mgbe e mesịrị na onwa Septemba n’afo 2010 ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwupụtara nnweta ọzọ nde $372 nke ụfọdụ akụ Petro Canada ya na UK.
